statistics.name: campaignOrSandbox
statistics.description:
Is the player in Campaign mode or Sandbox Mode? 1 for Campaign, 0 for Sandbox.

Reported whenever the player starts a given game mode.

statistics.name: campaign_zombiesNeutralized
statistics.description:
A running statistic of every zombie you've ever neutralized, ever, when playing this game, in ANY difficulty mode.

(In campaign mode).

statistics.name: challenge_1_score
statistics.description:
Go to sandbox mode, select challenge #1, and play it. 

Hi score.

statistics.name: challenge_2_score
statistics.description:
Go to sandbox mode, select challenge #3, and play it.

Hi Score

statistics.name: challenge_3_score
statistics.description:
Go to sandbox mode, select challenge #3, and play it.

Hi Score

statistics.name: challenge_4_score
statistics.description:
Go to sandbox mode, select challenge #4, and play it.

Hi Score

statistics.name: challenge_5_score
statistics.description:
Go to sandbox mode, select challenge #5, and play it.

Hi Score

statistics.name: challenge_zombiesNeutralized
statistics.description:
A running statistic of every zombie you've ever neutralized, ever, when playing this game.

(In challenges mode, from the sandbox menu).

statistics.name: defenseEfficiency_Hard
statistics.description: The best defense efficiency you've ever achieved in any level on campaign mode, on the super hard difficulty setting.

statistics.name: defenseEfficiency_Normal
statistics.description: The best defense efficiency you've ever achieved in any level on campaign mode, on the super normal difficulty setting.

statistics.name: difficultyMode
statistics.description:
The difficulty mode the player is playing in.

0 = Super Easy
1 = Super Normal
2 = Super Hard

statistics.name: fuelSourcesUsed
statistics.description:
The number of different fuel sources you've used. Not just researched, but actually USED.

(In campaign mode).

statistics.name: gameCompleted
statistics.description: Have you beaten the game (campaign mode)? 1 for yes, 0 for no. ANY difficulty mode.

statistics.name: gameCompleted_Hard
statistics.description: Have you completed the campaign in super hard mode? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: gameCompleted_Normal
statistics.description: Have you beaten the campaign in Super Normal mode? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: HighScore-Super Easy
statistics.description: HighScore-Super Easy

statistics.name: HighScore-Super Hard
statistics.description: HighScore-Super Hard

statistics.name: HighScore-Super Normal
statistics.description: HighScore-Super Normal

statistics.name: konamiCode
statistics.description:
Enter the Konami Code on the main screen to immediately access the theme song and credits.

0 by default,
1 once you achieve this.

statistics.name: levelBeaten_01
statistics.description: Have you beaten level 1 in the campaign? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: levelBeaten_02
statistics.description: Have you beaten level 2 in the campaign? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.description: Have you beaten level 7 in the campaign? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: levelBeaten_08
statistics.description: Have you beaten level 8 in the campaign? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: levelBeaten_09
statistics.description: Have you beaten level 9 in the campaign? 0 for no, 1 for yes.

statistics.name: levelCasualties_05_Hard
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed on level 5, in campaign mode, on super hard difficulty.

statistics.name: levelCasualties_06_Hard
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed on level 6, in campaign mode, on super hard difficulty.

statistics.name: levelCasualties_06_Normal
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed in level 6 in the campaign. (In super normal mode)

statistics.name: levelCasualties_07_Hard
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed on level 7, in campaign mode, on super hard difficulty.

statistics.name: levelCasualties_07_Normal
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed in level 7 in the campaign. (In super normal mode)

statistics.name: levelCasualties_09_Hard
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed on level 9, in campaign mode, on super hard difficulty.

statistics.name: levelCasualties_09_Normal
statistics.description: Number of buildings destroyed in level 9 in the campaign. (In super normal mode)

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_05_Hard
statistics.description:
Defense Efficiency achieved on level 5, in super hard mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

(Given as a percentage)

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_06_Hard
statistics.description:
Defense Efficiency achieved on level 6, in super hard mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

(Given as a percentage)

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_06_Normal
statistics.description:
The defense efficiency you've achieved on level 6. (in super normal mode)

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_07_Hard
statistics.description:
Defense Efficiency achieved on level 7, in super hard mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_07_Normal
statistics.description:
Defense Efficiency achieved on level 7, in super normal mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_09_Hard
statistics.description:
Defense Efficiency achieved on level 9, in super hard mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

(Given as a percentage)

statistics.name: levelDefenseEfficiency_09_Normal
statistics.description:
The defense efficiency you've achieved on level 9, in super Normal mode.

Efficiency is calculated as a percentage, which measures the ratio of how many zombies you've killed in a level divided by how many resources it took you to kill them.

statistics.name: levelTime_08_Hard
statistics.description: The amount of seconds taken to complete level 8 (on super hard difficulty mode)

statistics.name: levelTime_08_Normal
statistics.description: Amount of time (in seconds) it takes the player to complete level 8. (In super normal mode)

statistics.name: powerSourcesUsed
statistics.description:
The number of different KINDS of power sources (including Recycling Centers at upgrade level 2 or higher) you've used.

(In campaign mode).

statistics.name: recyclingUpgrade_Level_Normal
statistics.description: The level you have upgraded your recycling to in campaign mode. (In super Normal mode) Starts at 0, goes to 3.

statistics.description: Played sandbox level 1. 0 for no, 1 for yes.
